0101110100000110 0111110101110101 1 -> sum: 1101101001111100, cout: 0

1010010010111101 0000010010000011 0 -> sum: 1010100101000000, cout: 0
1000011001011000 0101111111001110 1 -> sum: 1110011000100111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
